definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: It is commenced from a transmission-line analogy.
Microwave transmission line model on a cylindrical wire grid is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了金属栅网的微波传输线模型。

sentences.english: The front end of the TEM horn antenna is a parallel plate transmission line.
sentences.chinese: TEM喇叭天线的前端是平行板传输线。

sentences.english: In addition, the output pattern in coaxial transmission line is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 另外，对同轴传输线内的输出模式进行了分析。

sentences.english: In spectral domain through the coordinate rotation, two independent equivalent transmission lines are obtained.
sentences.chinese: 在谱域中通过坐标旋转，得到两组独立的等效传输线。

sentences.english: The voltage and current waveforms and spectrums at source and load end of a transmission line.
sentences.chinese: 传输线输入端与负载端电压及电流之脉波及频谱。

sentences.english: The major theme of this thesis focuses on the methodology for the eye-diagram prediction of lossy transmission lines.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要是针对预测传输线接收端眼图的方法作探讨。

sentences.english: First one-dimensional PBG microwave transmission line is studied.
sentences.chinese: 首先研究了一维微波光子晶体传输线。

sentences.english: Finally, the 3nd Green's Function of the transmission line is obtained by means of the scattering sup…
sentences.chinese: 最后，用散射叠加法求得传输线的第三类格林函数。

sentences.english: Reflection is hardly observable for line transition time much less than pulse width.
sentences.chinese: 传输线传播时间甚小于脉波宽情况下不易显示反射。

sentences.english: Given a fixed trace width, three factors heavily influence pc-board-trace impedance decisions.
sentences.chinese: 固定的传输线宽度，有三个因素来决定传输阻抗。

sentences.english: A numerical method, Boundary Element Method, is introduced to calculate the characteristic impedance of a rectangle coaxial line with round center conductor.
sentences.chinese: 利用边界元法计算了内圆外矩同轴传输线的特性阻抗。

sentences.english: More and more people interest in the transmission line analysis for its simplicity.
sentences.chinese: 传输线分析方法的简便性，其引起了很多学者的兴趣。

sentences.english: In the transceiver, the wideband impendence match circuit is used to avoid the reflections because of impedance mismatch.
sentences.chinese: 利用宽带阻抗匹配电路解决信号的传输线反射问题。

sentences.english: This is the infamous single wire transmission line .
sentences.chinese: 这就是臭名昭著的单线传输线。

sentences.english: The equations of zero-sequence coupling transmission lines are derived from telegraph equations.
sentences.chinese: 运用电报方程推导出零序耦合传输线的输线方程。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
